title: Can I get a series 7 license if I have horrible credit
question: I had my home foreclosed on and have some pretty horrible credit. My question is can I get a series 7 license with this horrible credit?
answers: I highly doubt that simply having gone through foreclosure would make it so you cannot obtain a series 7 license. Do you owe deficiency post foreclosure?
Contact a local stock broker and request the information.
I don't have an exact answer for you, but the issue is not so much getting the license; you should be able to "get" the license. The issue will be getting a broker-dealer to handle your trades.
